This package deals with NMR restraints available from PDB as MR files and processed to BMRB databases.

MRAnnotator program
This programs enables an annotator to go through a sequence of MR files from the PDB to insert annotation comments in an efficient way. The annotations are checked for validity. Documentation of the source is at: {@link Wattos.Episode_II.MRAnnotate}.

SQL directory
The SQL statements needed to generate the database tables with content are given in db_create.sql

Data directory
The Data directory in this package contains the classification data in a csv formatted file. It is generated from an Excel file by MS Excel.
